wikipedia_page.main: Ian Riddell (1937/1938 – 25 September 2021) was a Scottish semi-professional footballer who played as a left-back.

response: Riddell was born in Glasgow, the son of teacher and former actress Hope Ross and former St Mirren and Berwick Rangers footballer Ian Riddell. He graduated from the University of Strathclyde with a degree in business before training at the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art, graduating in 1990.
*Ian Riddell, 82–84, Scottish footballer (St Mirren, Berwick Rangers).Ian Riddell
* 25 September: Ian Riddell, St Mirren and Berwick Rangers left-back.Ian Riddell
